versions.description:
Provides a set of moderator commands for enhanced server management, especially useful alongside the CPM (CSMM Patrons Mod). These commands offer tools for player moderation, world manipulation, and server administration.

  ## Key Functionality

  * **Player Management:**
      * `/kill <playerTarget>`: Instantly kills the specified player (requires confirmation).
      * `/mute <player> <reason>`: Mutes a player in chat with a specified reason.
      * `/unmute <player>`: Unmutes a player.
      * `/arrest <player> <reason>`: Places a player in a designated jail area with a reason.
      * `/release <player>`: Releases a player from jail.
      * `/pull <player>`: Teleports the specified player to the moderator's location.
      * `/rpd <player>`: Resets the specified player's data (use with extreme caution).
      * `/wi <player> <tool>`: Wipes a player's inventory (`belt`, `bag`, `equipment`, or `all`).
  * **Player Buffs/Debuffs:**
      * `/buff <player>`: Temporarily grants god-like powers to a player.
      * `/debuff <player>`: Removes specified debuffs from a player.
  * **World Manipulation:**
      * `/pr`: Resets the current Point of Interest (POI).
      * `/reset1`: Sets the first corner for chunk reset.
      * `/reset2`: Resets chunks between the first and second corners.
      * `/killall`: Kills all zombies on the server.
      * `/visitmap`: Opens the server map (requires CPM functionality).
  * **Server Control:**
      * `/shutdownba <minutes>`: Shuts down the server after a specified delay.

  ## How to Use

  1.  **Installation:** Install the module on your Takaro instance.
  2.  **CPM Requirement:** This module is designed to enhance 7 Days to Die servers using the CSMM Patrons Mod (CPM). While some commands may function without it, full functionality is not guaranteed.
  3.  **Discord Integration (Optional):**
      * Configure the `userDiscordChannel` setting to enable Discord notifications for certain moderation actions (e.g., bans, kicks, mutes).
  4.  **Permissions:** Grant the `STAFF_COMMANDS` permission to the player groups or individuals who should have access to these moderator commands.  Individual commands may have their own permissions as well.

  5.  **In-Game Usage:** Moderators can use the commands as described in the "Key Functionality" section. Pay close attention to the specific syntax and arguments required for each command (e.g., using quotes around player names with spaces).

  ## Important Considerations

  * **CPM Compatibility:** The module's functionality may depend on the specific version and configuration of the CSMM Patrons Mod.  Ensure compatibility to avoid issues.
  * **Permission Management:** Use the provided permissions to restrict access to these powerful moderator commands.  Incorrect usage can disrupt the game experience.
  * **Confirmation:** Some commands (e.g., `/kill`, `/rpd`) require confirmation to prevent accidental execution due to their potentially destructive nature.
  * **Discord Setup:** If using Discord notifications, ensure that your Takaro instance is properly configured to communicate with your Discord server.

commands.name: azomb
commands.description: Admins can set their own person zombie free zone.
commands.helpText: [02FEDC]Stand directly above your land claim when you run this command!!!!!![-]

commands.name: kill
commands.description: Kill a player
commands.helpText: [02FEDC]kill (players name) You must run the command a second time to confirm the kill. Use quotes for players with spaces in their name. Copy their name from Discord if you cannot type their name.[-]

arguments.name: playerTarget
arguments.helpText: The player you want to kill

commands.name: buff - 2
commands.description: Ends buff
commands.helpText: Ends players buff

commands.name: rdd
commands.description: Reset drone data for a player
commands.helpText: [02FEDC]rdd (player name) Use quotes for players with spaces in their name. Copy their name from Discord if you cannot type their name.[-]

arguments.name: playerTarget
arguments.helpText: Person drone data is being reset for

commands.name: pr
commands.description: Resets the POI you're standing in
commands.helpText: [02FEDC]Reset the POI you are standing in[-]

commands.name: release
commands.description: Release a player from jail
commands.helpText: [02FEDC]Release (player name) Use quotes for players with spaces in their name. Copy their name from Discord if you cannot type their name.[-]

commands.name: pull
commands.description: Pull a player to you
commands.helpText: [02FEDC]pull (player name) Use quotes for players with spaces in their name. Copy their name from Discord if you cannot type their name.[-]

commands.name: reset1
commands.description: First position to reset a chunk. Use /reset2 in the opposite corner to reset the desired area.
commands.helpText: [02FEDC]First position to reset a chunk. Use /reset2 in the opposite corner to reset the desired area.[-]

commands.name: reset2
commands.description: Last position to reset a chunk.
commands.helpText: [02FEDC]Last position to reset a chunk.[-]

commands.name: unmute
commands.description: Moderator command to unmute players in game chats
commands.helpText: [02FEDC]unmute (player name) Use quotes for players with spaces in their name. Copy their name from Discord if you cannot type their name.[-]

commands.name: th - 2
commands.description: Second round of Targeted Horde
commands.helpText: [02FEDC]Second round of a targeted horde[-]

commands.name: ban
commands.description: Ban players for 1 year
commands.helpText: [02FEDC]ban (player name) (reason in quotes) Use quotes for players with spaces in their name. Copy their name from Discord if you cannot type their name. [-]

arguments.name: reasoning
arguments.defaultValue: contact a moderator for the reason

commands.name: th - 3
commands.description: Third round of Targeted Horde
commands.helpText: Targeted Horde round 3

commands.name: rpd
commands.description: Resets a player's data. When there's no saving the data of a player. Use this as the last resort! You must confirm the reset by running it twice.
commands.helpText: [02FEDC]rpd (player name) Resets a player's data. Use quotes for players with spaces in their name. Copy their name from Discord if you cannot type their name.[-]

arguments.name: playerTarget
arguments.helpText: the player's data you are resetting

commands.name: avisit
commands.description: Visit a player without using currency.
commands.helpText: [02FEDC]avisit (player name) Use quotes for players with spaces in their name. Copy their name from Discord if you cannot type their name. [-]

commands.name: visitmap
commands.description: Open the map for Takaro and CPM
commands.helpText: [02FEDC]Open the map for Takaro and CPM.[-]

commands.name: cm  & dm
commands.description: Admin menu with creative menu and debugmode
commands.helpText: [02FEDC]Creative mode and debug menu. Reserved for admins[-]

commands.name: rvr
commands.description: Reset vending machine rental for a player.
commands.helpText: [02FEDC]rvr (player name) Use quotes for players with spaces in their name. Copy their name from Discord if you cannot type their name.[-]

commands.name: setjail
commands.description: Set an 11x11 area to put your jail birds in.
commands.helpText: [02FEDC]Set an 11x11 area to put hail birds in.[-]

commands.name: killall
commands.description: Kill all of the Zeds on the server.
commands.helpText: [02FEDC]Kill all of the Zeds on the server.[-]

commands.name: buff - 1
commands.description: Buff a player that's dieing a lot for 2 minutes.
commands.helpText: [02FEDC]buff (player name) Use quotes for players with spaces in their name. Copy their name from Discord if you cannot type their name.[-]

commands.name: kickall
commands.helpText: No help text available

commands.name: aaaaaaa
commands.helpText: No help text available

commands.name: arrest
commands.description: Arrest an unruly player
commands.helpText: [02FEDC]arrest (player name) (reason for arrest)[-]

commands.name: shutdownba
commands.description: Shut down the server with a timer. Type/ shutdownba (number of minutes) Example: /shutdownba 10
commands.helpText: No help text available

commands.name: th - 1
commands.description: Reset vending machine rental for a player.
commands.helpText: [02FEDC]Send a horde in 4 intervals in 30 seconds at a player. Type /th (name) Use quotes for players with spaces in their name. Copy their name from Discord if you cannot type their name. [-]

arguments.name: playerTarget
arguments.helpText: person you're sending the horde after

commands.name: kick
commands.description: Moderator command to kick players
commands.helpText: [02FEDC]kick (player name) (reason in quotes). Use quotes for players with spaces in their name. Copy their name from Discord if you cannot type their name.[-]

arguments.name: reasoning
arguments.defaultValue: Contact a moderator for a kick reason

commands.name: th - 4
commands.description: Fourth round of Targeted Horde
commands.helpText: [02FEDC]Fourth round of Targeted Horde[-]

commands.name: ocn
commands.description: Change a player's name in chat. Type /ocn (Name) (New Name). Use quotes for players with spaces in their name. Copy their name from Discord if you cannot type their name.
commands.helpText: [02FEDC] Change a player's name in chat. Type /ocn (Name) (New Name). Use quotes for players with spaces in their name. Copy their name from Discord if you cannot type their name. [-]

commands.name: mute
commands.description: Moderator command to mute players
commands.helpText: [02FEDMute (player name) (reason in quotes) Use quotes for players with spaces in their name. Copy their name from Discord if you cannot type their name.[-]

commands.name: wi
commands.description: Wipe a player's belt, bag of all
commands.helpText: Wipe a player's belt, bag, equipment, all

permissions.description: Zombie free command for admins to run the command for their personal house
Resets player drone data to place a new one
Visit the map to unlock for Takaro and CPM
Set the location of your jail
Commands for staff to use without using Currency
